### Importing Data
```{r}
car_resale <-
  read_xls("data/In_Class_Ex05/ToyotaCorolla.xls", "data")
```

```{r}
summary(car_resale)
```
```{r}
list(car_resale)
```
```{r}
summary1  <- car_resale %>%
  ExpData(type=1)
```
